_sText:
I thought that by the time I had reached beta 4 of this map I should include bigger and better changes.

Map supports 40 players.

Changes/Fixes

-CUSTOM SKY (thanks Wormkiller)
-Made window in Chimney House smaller + altered props and light.
-Zombies can't enter windows, altered props and light.
-Shortened wooden beam in caves + narrowed doorways.
-Changed box stacking in caves (for the fourth time!).
-Only 2 windows are breakable in church now.
-Brush work changes to Sun House.
-Made area under stone stacks a bit smaller to help out no reload servers.

Hopefully next version will include more area portals and HDR. Thanks H2 for textures.
